title: Giant Insects
description: Insects are everywhere on our planet, and many are so small that we don't notice them. Not these insects! Come along on a trip around the world to the homes of some of the largest insects on Earth. Find out their relative sizes, their habits, and where they live. Vibrant photographs enhance the text.
highFrequencyWords: adapted, canopy, colonies, evolved, fossil, mandibles, nocturnal, safari, species, swarm, titans, wingspan
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Inflectional Endings : Recognize and use inflectional ending -est
awareness: Compound Words                : Identify and create closed compound words
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
